books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes her journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House, and how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent.
books.name: BECOMING

books.author: by David Brooks
books.description: A New York Times Op-Ed columnist espouses having an outward focus to attain a meaningful life.
books.name: THE SECOND MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Chelsea Handler
books.description: The comedian chronicles going into therapy and becoming an advocate for change.
books.name: LIFE WILL BE THE DEATH OF ME

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Pete Buttigieg
books.description: A memoir by the current mayor of South Bend, Ind., and the first openly gay Democratic candidate to run for president of the United States.
books.name: SHORTEST WAY HOME

books.author: by Lori Gottlieb
books.description: A psychotherapist gains unexpected insights when she becomes another therapist’s patient.
books.name: MAYBE YOU SHOULD TALK TO SOMEONE

books.author: by Susan Page
books.description: A biography of the former first lady Barbara Bush, based on interviews and her private diaries.
books.name: THE MATRIARCH

books.author: by Ruth Reichl
books.description: A memoir by the former restaurant critic of The New York Times and editor in chief of Gourmet.
books.name: SAVE ME THE PLUMS

books.author: by John Carreyrou
books.description: The rise and fall of Theranos, the biotech startup that failed to deliver on its promise to make blood testing more efficient.
books.name: BAD BLOOD

books.author: by Dave Barry
books.description: The humorist tries to emulate his dog’s grace in contending with old age.
books.name: LESSONS FROM LUCY

books.author: by Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show.”
books.name: BORN A CRIME

books.author: by Ben Shapiro
books.description: The conservative political commentator reflects upon what he considers most impactful to Western civilization.
books.name: THE RIGHT SIDE OF HISTORY

books.author: by Sonia Purnell
books.description: The true story of a Baltimore socialite who joined a spy organization during World War II and became essential to the French Resistance.
books.name: A WOMAN OF NO IMPORTANCE

books.author: by Bill McKibben
books.description: How unchecked climate change, robotics and artificial intelligence threaten human existence.
books.name: FALTER
